== ao:body ==

|| _*ao:hasTopic*_ || The _ao:hasTopic_ property refers to a URI with *content intended to be consumed by a machine*. Typically a semantically specified resource.||

Examples of entities targeted by the _ao:hasTopic_ relationship are: URIs of terms from controlled vocabularies and ontologies, URIs of entities specified in structured knowledge bases.
